data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Is it important for students to participate in activities outside of school? If so, what kind of activities would be beneficial, and how would students benefit from them?
data.answer: It is very important for students to participate in activities outside school. Firstly, extracurricular activities are important because they can help improve students' academic performance. Participating in activities you are passionate about can increase your brain function, help you concentrate and manage your time better, all of which contribute to higher grades. Secondly, they can help create broader perspectives. When you participate in multiple different activities, you’ll get the opportunity to explore a range of interests and unlock passions you never knew you had! Plus, diversifying your interests subsequently broadens your worldview.
